title: Lithos POS - Point of Sale

creator: Lithos Technosoft LLP
descriptionHtml:
LithosPOS is a leading retail/restaurant POS software with everything you need to run & grow your business.

Benefits:
We help you sell online and offline. Create a free online catalog to begin taking orders over the Internet, and get a powerful Point of Sale App to manage your entire operation from your Android Device or Android POS Terminals

Features: -
- Offline mode
- Analytics & Reporting
- Integrated Payments
- Inventory
- Customer Loyalty
- Multi-store
- Expert Support
- Wide Range of Hardware compatibility
- Dashboard for owners
- Email / SMS Receipts

Printers Supported :
- WIFI/ LAN
- Bluetooth
- USB

Managing your whole business operations, Analysing your performance and Responding to your customer needs will be easier.

title:
LithosPOS - Retail/F&B POS
9.13.0

creator: LITHOSPOS Inc
descriptionHtml:
LithosPOS, a leading integrated Point of Sale (POS) solution for restaurants and retail, offers speed, efficiency, and ease of use.
With 10+ years of industry experience, serving 10000+ clients globally, and high integration capabilities, it streamlines operations and accelerates checkouts by 20%. Operating on Android, iOS, and Windows, LithosPOS boasts supporting apps for table ordering, self-ordering KIOSK, queue management, and efficient online ordering. Its user-friendly design, backed by 24x7 expert support, ensures hassle-free self-implementation, making it the ideal solution for businesses worldwide.

★ Easy-to-use UI for seamless operations.
★ Real-time data access for instant insights.
★ Integration capability with leading payment services
★ Fast and efficient performance.
★ Discount and loyalty management for enhanced customer engagement.
★ Table ordering and self-ordering kiosk support.
★ Cross-platform support for iOS, Android, and Windows.
★ Online ordering and efficient delivery management.
★ Stock transfer functionality between stores.
★ Comprehensive features including production, inventory, on-account sales, and menu management.
★ Staff management tools for efficient performance tracking.
★ Table management features to streamline reservations and optimize seating.
★ Kitchen Order Ticket (KOT) management for organized and timely food preparation.
★ Seamless integration with various aggregator platforms to expand business reach.
★ In-depth accounting book integrations for accurate financial tracking.
★ Mall management system integration for businesses operating within malls.
★ Exceptional scalability with over 10,000 clients from diverse industries globally.
★ 24x7 customer support ensuring assistance across different regions.
★ Multilingual support, including Spanish, French, Arabic, German, Chinese, Indonesian, Dutch, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Swedish and English.
★ Multi-kitchen management capabilities to handle complex kitchen workflows efficiently.

Integrated Payments:
Seamless integration with leading providers from 45 countries streamlines credit card processing, eliminating clerical errors and accelerating checkout. Enjoy a secure and efficient transaction environment.

Aggregator Integration:
LithosPOS seamlessly integrates with leading aggregators like Podium, Zomato, DoorDash, and more. This integration optimizes order management.

Accounting Integration:
Link your system with renowned platforms like QuickBooks, Oracle ERP, and SAP for accurate financial data synchronization for streamlined bookkeeping, and reduces manual entry errors.

Advance reports:
Generate detailed reports on item-wise sales, store-wise sales, and supplier-wise performance. Dive into tracking seasonal sales trends, and access customer-wise store-wise multi-store combined sales data.

Offline support:
LithosPOS seamlessly operates both online and offline, ensuring uninterrupted business transactions.

Discounts and Loyalty:
Apply discounts to receipts or specific items effortlessly. The powerful and flexible Loyalty program is user-friendly and automatically enrolls new customers.

24/7 Live Chat & Support:
Experience unparalleled customer support 24/7 and live chat assistance.

KOT:
Efficiently manage orders with KOT. Create, save orders, and send them to KOT Printers

Item Variants:
Perfect for products available in different sizes or colors, this feature condenses the item list for smoother operation

Item Modifiers:
Customize orders with Item Modifiers. Choose add-ons for dishes or modify their preparation with just one click

Easy Barcode Scanning:
Use the built-in rear camera of your mobile device or a barcode scanner to swiftly scan items during a sale

Printers:
LithosPOS supports various printer options, including Ethernet/WIFI, Bluetooth, USB receipt printers, and printer-connected cash drawers

Multiple Locations:
Effortlessly manage multiple stores. Monitor sales, inventory, employees, and customers on the go
descriptionShort: LithosPOS is a retail/restaurant POS with everything to run & grow your business
